# isVideoStabilizationModeSupported(_:)

**Instance Method**

A Boolean value that indicates whether the format supports a given video stabilization mode.

## Declaration

```swift
func isVideoStabilizationModeSupported(_ videoStabilizationMode: AVCaptureVideoStabilizationMode) -> Bool
```

## Parameters

- **videoStabilizationMode**: The stabilization mode to test.

## Return Value

[doc://com.apple.documentation/documentation/Swift/true] if video stabilization is supported; otherwise, [doc://com.apple.documentation/documentation/Swift/false].

## Determining video stabilization support

- **AVCaptureVideoStabilizationMode**: An enumeration of video stabilization modes that capture devices and formats support.
